Fig. 1 (a) The coordination environment of the Sm(III) ion in 1. The hydrogen atoms are omitted for clarity except those bonds to carboxylate oxygen atoms. Symmetry codes: i = –x + 4/3, −y + 5/3, −z + 2/3; ii = x − y + 1, x, −z + 1; iii = −x + y + 1/3, −x + 5/3, z − 1/3. (b) A dodecanuclear Sm(III) macrocycle. The green balls represent the dinuclear units. The hydrogen atoms are omitted for clarity. (c) The 2D layer consisting of the hexagonal rings. (d) The representation of the connection mode among the hexagonal rings. The green balls represent the dinuclear units.
